text: Rufoclanis fulgurans is a moth in the family of Sphingidae. It is usually from Zimbabwe to Tanzania and eastern Kenya. Its wings are usually 22â€“32mm for males. They are up to 40mm for females. Its colour is a pale pinkish brown. It more or less runs parallel to the termen. == References == Category:Smerinthini
title: Rufoclanis fulgurans
